function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No in vitro data on efficacy of hand washing against coronavirus contamination on hands.","Impact":"Risk of not effectively eliminating coronavirus from hands, leading to potential transmission.","Mitigation":"Conduct in vitro studies to test the efficacy of hand washing against coronavirus contamination on hands.","Technologies":"Laboratory equipment for in vitro studies, testing protocols for evaluating hand washing efficacy.","People":"Healthcare workers, general public.","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions."},{"Description":"Compliance with hand hygiene is likely to remain an obstacle, especially among physicians.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to low hand hygiene compliance among healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted hand hygiene training programs for healthcare workers, provide easy access to hand hygiene facilities.","Technologies":"Online training modules, hand hygiene monitoring systems, mobile hand wash stations.","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital administrators.","Owner":"Hospital administration, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Human coronaviruses can remain infectious on inanimate surfaces for up to 9 days.","Impact":"Potential for prolonged surface contamination and increased risk of transmission through fomites.","Mitigation":"Regular and systematic surface disinfection using effective agents like sodium hypochlorite or ethanol.","Technologies":"Surface disinfection equipment, automated cleaning systems, disinfectant application technology.","People":"Cleaning staff, facility management teams, general public.","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning service providers, public health agencies."}]}
